TiDB AgentX Hackathon Webinar (https://info.pingcap.com/e3t/Ctc/I4+113/cxmyM04/VXjXp55ryHQBW5DcYM08gzCQjW2dmkKk5BpWfHN39GZCb5m_5PW69t95C6lZ3p4Vy5yZh7QlbRZW6tqVZM7GSl08W10RD2B3bq4qWW8nFp4V3Wj9HsW4fJkFf4X2S_8W1ZcW3J4YqT8_W3pxXpr6DDc8MW4k0j0q4-Hy4fW1jxZ4161Vsj1Vm4HxS7D7VRQW3BW2hZ8pHYfwVKL3HG89wXckW6yNp9m7KLjYvW5TFjM46q_RcyW75tZFk5wc9lwVr6Xfn2YpPXsW3qS9JQ3-962CW5CPfl46_7jDwW7pYYgy6HMMwRW1mhtct3wB6vSW5XkRf89cLqRKW8z5QgF4X1XbSN6KKmr8KPZdWW6rGgf15dsCBDN6S8CXxHrySbV7wnkn64LDj9N6bxz-s4nS97N3kHSmMdzW9wW72Jsp41-lxx7W1Y7yzX4mry3pW6Xfr3l4c39ZdW1ZzQx45Ndk4XW5c7NPV60w6kpW5drLcG5qKcf1W7KXp9w2K_mX0Vjjyd777J_fhf7KQvfl04 )

Hi Marvellous,

It's happening tomorrow! This TiDB AgentX Hackathon 2025 live session, "Build Your Own Semantic Q&A Assistant with TiDB, Kiro, and Sheet0 (https://info.pingcap.com/e3t/Ctc/I4+113/cxmyM04/VXjXp55ryHQBW5DcYM08gzCQjW2dmkKk5BpWfHN39GZCb5m_5PW69t95C6lZ3p4Vy5yZh7QlbRZW6tqVZM7GSl08W10RD2B3bq4qWW8nFp4V3Wj9HsW4fJkFf4X2S_8W1ZcW3J4YqT8_W3pxXpr6DDc8MW4k0j0q4-Hy4fW1jxZ4161Vsj1Vm4HxS7D7VRQW3BW2hZ8pHYfwVKL3HG89wXckW6yNp9m7KLjYvW5TFjM46q_RcyW75tZFk5wc9lwVr6Xfn2YpPXsW3qS9JQ3-962CW5CPfl46_7jDwW7pYYgy6HMMwRW1mhtct3wB6vSW5XkRf89cLqRKW8z5QgF4X1XbSN6KKmr8KPZdWW6rGgf15dsCBDN6S8CXxHrySbV7wnkn64LDj9N6bxz-s4nS97N3kHSmMdzW9wW72Jsp41-lxx7W1Y7yzX4mry3pW6Xfr3l4c39ZdW1ZzQx45Ndk4XW5c7NPV60w6kpW5drLcG5qKcf1W7KXp9w2K_mX0Vjjyd777J_fhf7KQvfl04 ) " could be your game-changer.

This hands-on demo will show you exactly how to:

-

Combine TiDB Serverless + Kiro + Sheet0 for powerful AI-native apps

-

Harness semantic search and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to supercharge your projects

-

Get inspired with ideas that can set your hackathon submission apart

Save Your Spot!
(https://info.pingcap.com/e3t/Ctc/I4+113/cxmyM04/VXjXp55ryHQBW5DcYM08gzCQjW2dmkKk5BpWfHN39GZCb5m_5PW69t95C6lZ3p4Vy5yZh7QlbRZW6tqVZM7GSl08W10RD2B3bq4qWW8nFp4V3Wj9HsW4fJkFf4X2S_8W1ZcW3J4YqT8_W3pxXpr6DDc8MW4k0j0q4-Hy4fW1jxZ4161Vsj1Vm4HxS7D7VRQW3BW2hZ8pHYfwVKL3HG89wXckW6yNp9m7KLjYvW5TFjM46q_RcyW75tZFk5wc9lwVr6Xfn2YpPXsW3qS9JQ3-962CW5CPfl46_7jDwW7pYYgy6HMMwRW1mhtct3wB6vSW5XkRf89cLqRKW8z5QgF4X1XbSN6KKmr8KPZdWW6rGgf15dsCBDN6S8CXxHrySbV7wnkn64LDj9N6bxz-s4nS97N3kHSmMdzW9wW72Jsp41-lxx7W1Y7yzX4mry3pW6Xfr3l4c39ZdW1ZzQx45Ndk4XW5c7NPV60w6kpW5drLcG5qKcf1W7KXp9w2K_mX0Vjjyd777J_fhf7KQvfl04 )

Time: 9:00 AM PT / 12:00 PM ET

Whether you’re already hacking or still on the fence, this is your chance to hit the ground running!

P.S. If you can't make it, register anyway (https://info.pingcap.com/e3t/Ctc/I4+113/cxmyM04/VXjXp55ryHQBW5DcYM08gzCQjW2dmkKk5BpWfHN39GZCb5m_5PW69t95C6lZ3p4Vy5yZh7QlbRZW6tqVZM7GSl08W10RD2B3bq4qWW8nFp4V3Wj9HsW4fJkFf4X2S_8W1ZcW3J4YqT8_W3pxXpr6DDc8MW4k0j0q4-Hy4fW1jxZ4161Vsj1Vm4HxS7D7VRQW3BW2hZ8pHYfwVKL3HG89wXckW6yNp9m7KLjYvW5TFjM46q_RcyW75tZFk5wc9lwVr6Xfn2YpPXsW3qS9JQ3-962CW5CPfl46_7jDwW7pYYgy6HMMwRW1mhtct3wB6vSW5XkRf89cLqRKW8z5QgF4X1XbSN6KKmr8KPZdWW6rGgf15dsCBDN6S8CXxHrySbV7wnkn64LDj9N6bxz-s4nS97N3kHSmMdzW9wW72Jsp41-lxx7W1Y7yzX4mry3pW6Xfr3l4c39ZdW1ZzQx45Ndk4XW5c7NPV60w6kpW5drLcG5qKcf1W7KXp9w2K_mX0Vjjyd777J_fhf7KQvfl04 ) and we'll send the recording!
